select tp.post_number, tp.user_number, post_title, tu.user_nickname, tpf.post_file_index, tp.post_date, tp.post_thumbnail from tbl_post tp left outer join tbl_user tu on tp.user_number = tu.user_number left outer join tbl_post_file tpf on tpf.post_number = tp.post_number where tp.user_number = #{userNumber} order by tp.post_date desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
mapper.insert: insert tbl_post (post_title, post_content, post_view_count, user_number, post_recipe_content) values(#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postViewCount}, #{userNumber}, #{postRecipeContent})
mapper.select: select post_number , post_title , post_content , post_date , post_view_count , u.user_number, u.user_id from tbl_user u join tbl_post p on post_number = #{postNumber} and u.user_number = p.user_number
mapper.update: update tbl_post set post_view_count = post_view_count + 1 where post_number = #{postNumber}
mapper.select: select p.post_number, up.user_profile_image_system_name, u.user_number, u.user_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_recipe_content, count(pl.post_number) as post_like_count, p.post_view_count, p.post_date from tbl_user u join tbl_post p on u.user_number = p.user_number left join tbl_user_profile_image up on u.user_number = up.user_number left join tbl_post_like pl on p.post_number = pl.post_number where p.post_number = #{postNumber} group by p.post_number, up.user_profile_image_system_name, u.user_number, u.user_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_recipe_content, p.post_view_count, p.post_date
